lender.name: Kim Tillman
lender.loan_because: I want to help artists and craftsmen everywhere to gain from their creativity and artistic talents. To help them in supporting theirselves for their own self-esteem and empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired, but am also an artist. I make jewelry, pottery items and paint/decorate small furniture pieces to help supplement my own income just like the people I support on Kiva.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate women in other parts of the world be able to make a better life for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: I want to help people overcome their needs as much as God helps me cover my needs. I hope some of mine could help reaching your goals.
lender.occupational_info: I work utilizing the internet and I find great opportunities. I maintain blogs, selling stuffs and building a network.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: I want to share happiness as far as I am able to others
lender.occupational_info: buy raw seafoods and process to frozen- ready to use product.

lender.name: Saran
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't have become what i am today if not for the help from lots of wonderful people.I wish to do the same for others.

lender.name: Lori
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be able to loan. I realize how lucky I am and want to share whenever possible
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance function of the entertainment business.

lender.name: Dessy Aliandrina
lender.loan_because:
I believe that 'sharing is loving',..
It's not about the amount, but the act to lend your hands, which meant a lot for people in another part of the world. A small thing from us, can change a life of a family over there. We may not know them, we may not be able to see them, but who cares. Talk less and do more, so lets lend your hands against poverty.

lender.name: TheBoreds
lender.loan_because: We can.
lender.occupational_info: We just participate in inane conversations and internet shenanigans.

lender.name: DeBorrah K
lender.loan_because: I love to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Marriage Educator / Christian Counseling / Life Coach

lender.name: Chi-Liang
lender.loan_because: I loan because it is a right thing to do.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David Harper
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans to small entrepreneurs build our world from the grassroots. It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 12 to 14 year old students foreign languages , history and geography. Most importantly, I hope I teach t hem to care about others and themselves to build a future with hope.

lender.name: Varun
lender.loan_because: I am human
lender.occupational_info: making machines work to make money for other people

lender.name: Abdurrahman
lender.loan_because: I grow up without my father, and I want to survive and make my own money. My father passed away when I was 3 years old. I must have my mom to survive, and I want to improve my small internet cafe in Jakarta.
lender.occupational_info: Manage my internet cafe and maintain the problem by repairing small error

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: Jesus gave Himself up for me.
lender.occupational_info: ‘But you were always a good man of business, Jacob,’ faltered Scrooge, who now began to apply this to himself. ‘Business!’ cried the Ghost, wringing its hands again. ‘Mankind was my business. The common welfare was my business; charity, mercy, forbearance, and benevolence were, all, my business. The dealings of my trade were but a drop of water in the comprehensive ocean of my business!’ --Charles Dickens, A Christmas Carol

lender.name: Christopher
lender.occupational_info: i write songs and record music in new york and los angeles

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I'm grateful for all the opportunities I've been given and I want to help provide opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info:
I get people's feedback on educational and non-profit programs through things like internet research, surveys, and interviews. Basically trying to figure out what's working, what could be improved, what clients would like to see changed, etc.
I'm also doing a masters in global health and hope to contribute to improving the health status of people in communities throughout the world.

lender.name: sello
lender.loan_because: I understand what is like to live in a country which has an inequitable credit system which shuts out the majority of potential lenders.
lender.occupational_info: I specialise in enterprise development and the main focus of those enterprises is poverty alleviation and skills development.

lender.name: Cherie and Rob
lender.loan_because: We are blessed to live in a stable country and have good jobs. We are thankful that all our basic needs are met, and we want to help others who are in more difficult situations. God be with you!
lender.occupational_info: Cherie works in a public library, where citizens have free access to information. They can borrow books and movies, and use the internet for free. Rob is a salesman for a good company that coaches their customers on how to lead better lives and care for their families.

lender.name: M. Andi Rahman
lender.occupation: computer for rent and mini store
lender.loan_because: I want to enlarge my business, but I'm stuck on fund to do it
lender.occupational_info: I open from 07.00 until 21.00 everyday, and my circumstance is student, and that's my consumer. I have 3 computer to rent and 2 printer to support the jobs. My mini store is beside my rental, it's contain cigarette, noodle, water mineral, and so on. I want to enlarge to fill up my store and fulfill my consumer's satisfy.

lender.name: jamara janine
lender.loan_because: it feels good to have the money flowing and i love to share my own abundance.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: Being borned in a previleged family is something I really treasure but I think it can be more useful if I can help others..and this is the least I can do..
lender.occupational_info: I own a truck dealership

lender.name: Serge
lender.loan_because: I help those in need and I get a better return than a savings account.
lender.occupational_info: I export industrial products to foreign lands.

lender.name: Rachael & Sander
lender.loan_because: We believe in sustainable food supplies for everyone, and want to eradicate poverty
lender.occupational_info: We both work in fields related to computers. Rachael teaches people to use computer programs, Sander maintains the software.

lender.name: Faith
lender.loan_because: I feel I have contributed in a small way to someone that is working hard to change their life and the lives of others. It's a great feeling.
lender.occupational_info: We sell homes in Northeast Ohio, making a difference for our clients is a huge source of satisfaction

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I want to give back and show my children that we can make a difference in someone else's life.

lender.name: Rochelle & Jodi
lender.loan_because: We listed Kiva on our wedding invitation as a place where guests could donate money, because we have such admiration for people who approach the world with creativity and optimism.
lender.occupational_info: Rochelle works with children who are 3-4-5 years old in preschools who are having trouble with speaking clearly, understanding directions, and/or expressing themselves in complete thoughts. Jodi directs choirs and leads worship services at their Lutheran church.

lender.name: Ryan Crosby
lender.loan_because:
My parents raised me to serve my community and my country. I believe this service is the highest calling a man can fulfill. My father and mother have been a great inspiration to me in this regard. They have given money to charity every year for more than 40 years now, and donated thousands of hours of their time to help the homeless, improve their community, and build a better neighborhood wherever they live. I am trying to build on their model of selfless service on a global level.
In the past, my job has sometimes required me to do unpleasant things. Helping people now-- in microlending, and in other endeavors-- is how I heal myself.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Captain in the United States Army. I have been in the Army since I was 18.

lender.name: steve roh
lender.loan_because: Helping to increase global prosperity is a good long-term investment.
lender.occupational_info: I run Center City Hypnosis in Philadelphia PA USA. I help people increase their mental strength so that they can achieve their goals.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: "No need for greed or hunger, a brotherhood of man" -Imagine by John Lennon

lender.name: Higher Perspectives
lender.loan_because: Real businesses should make a real difference in the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: We develop websites that give individuals, organizations, and businesses a voice for their products, services, ideas, and causes.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good, and I can easily help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help government understand how to use science in their environmental departments.

lender.name: Syren Family
lender.loan_because: We like to help others get an opportunity
lender.occupational_info: Helping heal people, physically as well as finacially

lender.name: Avanti
lender.occupational_info:
First of all, I learned about Kiva from Oprah's Show in Metro TV (Indonesia's News TV) on Feb 10, 2008.
Jakarta-Indonesia, Feb 10, 2008
I facilitate people to discover better value to achieve their smart goals.
I choose to coach innovators and entrepreneurs. I want to show them how beautiful life is and how we can create a better world by doing good and better and great things. Besides coaching entrepreneurs and innovators, I facilitate the teaching-learning in management and innovation in Universitas Indonesia.
"In the Internet era and with the abundance of energy coming to Kiva, what we can give to people is then unlimited." Congratulations Kiva!
Thank you.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to
lender.occupational_info: I own a small business which provides web site hosting and shopping carts on the internet.

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: My loan can help change lives and 100% of what I give goes to the lendee. Kiva is making a difference and I support their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Coca-Cola and supply parts to make sure cooler and fountain machines keep running.

lender.name: Bill
lender.occupational_info: I am a flight nurse in Bend, Oregon USA. I transport sick or injured patients from rural and remote places to higher levels of care (regional hospitals).

lender.name: Jen, Jay, CK & BK
lender.loan_because:
"It's a good thing." -- Christian (8)
"It's nice." -- Bergen (5)
'To help others help themselves, and to help teach our children about their global responsibility." -- Jen and Jay
lender.occupational_info: Jen and Jay work in publishing. Christian and Bergen are students.

lender.name: Brianne
lender.loan_because: I am a young Canadian woman who knows how much of an unfair advantage I have just because of the region in which I was born. I want to share my wealth (or what little I can actually call mine) with those who, for reasons totally beyond their control, must work tirelessly to achieve even a fraction of the quality of life we North Americans take entirely for granted.
lender.occupational_info: The work I do now isn't the work I hope to do for the rest of my life. I work for my mother, who is an accountant; I help her keep track of the finances of other companies that operate in our city. I'm in school for psychology, though, and I hope to one day use my knowledge to reach out to others in many different ways.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Help develop a self sustaining world where individuals can strive to make their dreams come true.
lender.occupational_info: HIgh tech sales

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: an opportunity is the best gift I could give, and knowing that I've possibly helped someone build their own future is the best gift I could receive

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: It is a simple, direct, and meaningful way to help make a difference.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: It is a simple, direct, and meaningful way to help make a difference.

lender.name: James and Shannon
lender.loan_because: Microcredit works! We love Kiva's approach; allowing individuals to provide lenders the necessary capital for investment. Programs of this nature produce real results, empowering individuals and entire communities with the tools they need to provide for themselves and their families for a lifetime. We have been so blessed in our lives that it's the least we can do; to loan money to those who can use it most.

lender.name: darcy
lender.loan_because: I want to model for my students...
lender.occupational_info: Teaching young people about the world outside their comfort zone.

lender.name: Andy
lender.occupational_info: Helping nonprofits do more

lender.name: Juliet and Charles
lender.loan_because: We want to help small entrepreneurs create a sustainable living.
lender.occupational_info: Juliet writes software documentation. Charles is the librarian at an elementary school. We have a 10 year old son.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can make a difference even if it is in a small way.

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: This is the point of globalization: to invest capital in developing countries in order to boost their economies.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference with people who may not have the opportunities that I have been given in life.
lender.occupational_info: I teach private lessons in piano, guitar, voice and percussion. I produce recitals to give my students an opportunity to perform.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: I have more of everything than I will ever need, so I'm just looking for a way to share some of my good fortune.

lender.name: Srivatsan Hari
lender.loan_because: I know who this goes to and supporting someone's business is something I always want to do.
lender.occupational_info: Other than going to school I work as a part-time programmer.

lender.name: Cathy & Lee
lender.loan_because: of Karma! When one is blessed, one should share and help others. Do onto others as you would have done onto you! Be blessed -> share & help others!

lender.name: Gerard
lender.loan_because: It makes sense to help people make a living and increase their ability to contribute to the world
lender.occupational_info: I help buyers and sellers of homes get together. I help people buy or sell their home or property.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Because I believe we all have to help our fellow citizens around the world who do not have the benefits and opportunities we have in developed countries
lender.occupational_info: I design and project manage the installation of networks such as Internet, corporate or local telecommunications infrastructure to connect offices and companies across the world. I work on specific projects for corporations that require communicating with their remote and home offices.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe that the "American Dream" is not the sole domain of Americans. More rightly, it should be a global/universal dream to be able to provide for your family, live with respect and achieve whatever goals you set forth for yourself.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: I can and it helps to make a difference, in small way 's in someones life. My daughter gave this to me for Christmas.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home' cooking and cleaning etc. I read a great deal & do watch TV. I've been sick for the past year& am in limited going out.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because:
I've seen firsthand the way microloans can really improve people's lives, and have a ripple effect on the whole community.
Also, I needed student loans to help me get to where I am today, and I believe it's my responsibility to pass that favour on to someone else.

lender.name: Shelby
lender.loan_because: I think that its the right thing to do to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm still a student in 7th grade

lender.name: Robin
lender.occupation: Retail Sales of Herbs and Vitamins
lender.loan_because: This is an opportunity to reach out to people all around the world and make a difference in their way of life. My hope is to see someone's life change by merely giving them the means to change their environment and giving their spirit a lift. Hoping that they in turn can be the positive role model for their next generation.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an herbacy, selling supplements for our bodies as well as our minds. We help our community understand there are alternatives to western medicine with positive results.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I can and I should. This is one way in which I can make a small difference in someone's future. I'm blessed to do it. It makes me feel really good.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a educational publishing company.

lender.name: Spencer
lender.loan_because: I was given a certificate and I think this is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I create music, I record music, and I mix music for myself and other people.

lender.name: Justo
lender.loan_because: I believe that microfinance is a great idea. Entrepreneurs in developing countries can grow their businesses with these micro loans.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an economics student at Cal Poly Pomona.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: We are all one spirit. When we recoginize that truth, we understanding that giving is best way to improve and enrich one's personal life and path....and begin the chain reaction of healing the world.
lender.occupational_info: I connect with my higher self, to assist others in overcoming personal trauma, and assisting clients in finding the lessons that are required to move themselves forward towards the utilmate goal of enlightenment.

lender.name: Shelly
lender.loan_because: The Kiva website makes it SO easy & interesting!

lender.name: JonR
lender.loan_because: I wish for increased wealth for all.
lender.occupational_info: Helping large businesses secure their computing infrastructure.

lender.name: Noel
lender.loan_because: I want to empower women to be independent and entrepreneurial and to become positive role models for girls and women in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Creative, inspirational, earthy. My work in metal tells stories and reflects my passions and world views.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: it's what Christ would do

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can. Helping people to help themselves is something I'm glad to be a part of.

lender.name: KAT
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to me and I want to share. The more I travel the world, the more I realize that we are all wonderful human beings together seeking to fufill our dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Peace and harmony in the world comes one person at a time. I believe in active social justice and tolerance.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: it is important to help others. I also appreciate being able to see what my loan can help someone else achieve.

lender.name: andrea
lender.loan_because: Choices that support others in becoming the best versions of themselves are almost always positive. Kiva gives us a rare opportunity to significantly impact the lives of those whose worlds we may never before have had the opportunity to touch.

lender.name: Andy
lender.occupation: Personal Assistant to people with autism

lender.name: Joel + Mia
lender.occupation: Energy Markets Specialist and Doctoral Student
lender.loan_because: We'd like to give a chance to others, who by no fault of their own, do not have access to resources that many of us tend to take for granted. We loan out of thanksgiving for we have been given opportunities that neither of us ever dreamed of obtaining.

lender.name: Gene
lender.loan_because: With the wealth many Americans enjoy, I believe it is important we share that wealth around the world to promote others improved standards of living and in turn fostering world peace and prosperity for all.
lender.occupational_info: I teach instrumental music to 11-13 year old students in our public schools and play clarinet professionally.

lender.name: RAY
lender.loan_because:
WHY NOT? "I've been a fool for lesser things"-Billy Joel
There were times, I was down and out - I know what it's like to need some help.
lender.occupational_info: I have spent 30 years in uniform - I now teach young adults basic skills for living in today's world. HOOAH!

lender.name: Monika & Olov
lender.loan_because: we would have wanted someone to do the same thing for us!
lender.occupational_info: Monika works part-time and Olov is a stay-at-home dad.

lender.name: Linda and Louise
lender.loan_because: we care

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I loan on behalf of my son. I pray that I will be able to raise him to be kind, compassionate, and giving. I hope to teach him that even little acts of kindness can have a big impact. And maybe, just maybe, by the time he understand the impact, this world will be a better place to live.

lender.name: Rylan & his Parents
lender.loan_because: Our 5 year old son chose to loan his hard-earned money to Francisca. What a boy!

lender.name: Nick
lender.occupational_info: I develop software programs for computers

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: I like to help people

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I admire these entrepreneurs work ethic, dedication and courage.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home raising my two sons. Both are under the age of 4.

lender.name: K & J
lender.loan_because: Our mom let us.

lender.name: Michaela and Eddie
lender.loan_because: it's important to give to people in the world

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to help.....especially women and children to get educated and work towards their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I run a small company involved in selling medical research products.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: It is important to empower everyone. I no longer have a sponsor child and feel this is a better way to make a difference as the impact is greater.
lender.occupational_info: I write curriculum to teach science, math and engineering to children. I also run a ferret shelter to rescue and rehome ferrets.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are working to make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 7th grade student.

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: I believe in people and their ability to create change.

lender.name: Angelo Eros
lender.loan_because: It's a divine way that shows "gratitude is the attitude." I love that warm fuzzy feeling inside of just knowing you served a higher cause and you did it with your higher self.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Reiki master and psychic medium that does readings for internet and TV shows and I help encourage others to open their psychic abilities and show how wonderful life is when you can live with your higher self, remove your ego boundaries and live life in gratitude with laughter. Your inner voice is the most powerful voice you will ever hear...

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I want to help out in some small way.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I want to help folks to acheive their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help determine the feasability of buying a company.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of all the money I donate going directly to the person with the need.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the state police helping victims of crime.

lender.name: Kristi
lender.occupational_info: Adult ESL Instructor, community college

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to be a part of good things happening.
lender.occupational_info: I make art.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I want to share the proceeds of my "birth lottery". Since when has human dignity been withheld based on geography?
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher of woodworking in a high school. I also own a clock making business called Bradley Woodworks.

lender.name: Karen & Jeff
lender.occupational_info: We do research to improve weather models

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people around the world the opportunity to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: My professional work involves sharing the power of philanthropy with people. I talk with university alumni and let them know how their gifts can help to transform the university for the future. I also help to show donors the impact of their contributions.

lender.name: Ramdas
lender.loan_because: Help raise the living standard across the world and support the ones who are courageous to take risk and do something in life.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: Its the right thing to do.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: If we were all willing to help those around us who are in need, the world would be a much better place.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a designer at General Motors.

lender.name: Thera
lender.loan_because: I want to help others have opportunities around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to work to protect wildlife through research.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: Started my business with virtually nothing and even though I still don't have much by American standards I can share with others who are also trying to start a business to earn a living.
lender.occupational_info: I use my hands and tools to repair and build things for others.

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can help.

lender.name: Mosaic Massage Clients
lender.loan_because: my clients are generous people who contribute to a Kiva Fund.
lender.occupational_info: I help people retain or regain their health through natural means.

lender.name: kye chul
lender.loan_because: happy! ^^

lender.name: Niall Battson
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a difference in the world
lender.occupational_info:
I am a Product Manager for the semiconductor start-up company eASIC. The job involves cutting edge technology and demands global travel, making it exciting work.
In my spare time I devote a lot of time to non profit causes. Currently, I am a Board of Director and Communications leader for the non-profit Foundation for Freedom. We are focused on promoting literacy in impoverished communities around the world through primary education for children.

lender.name: Siddarth
lender.loan_because: I want to help people around the world.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lender.name: Kelley
lender.loan_because: I want to help women in developing countries get ahead. Women have an incredible power to move themselves forward as long as they are given opportunity.

lender.name: Grant and Lacey
lender.loan_because: it's not our money, it's God's. We choose to share what we've been given to help out those in need.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: They deserve a chance to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I assist senior citizens & disabled people with Health insurance problems.

lender.name: Brother Bernard
lender.loan_because: A small gesture can go a long way toward helping someone.
lender.occupational_info: I encourage mutural respect among religions and nations through helping the sick (as a clinical psychologist & doctor of natural medicine). I am also honored to give retreats and workshops when invited and to do spiritual direction.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. I want to improve our world in a small way.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a large computer company.

lender.name: Jelani
lender.loan_because: Its what God would want me to do.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to be better.

lender.name: Amanda & Brandon
lender.loan_because: It's one way we can reach out to others.

lender.name: Srikanth
lender.loan_because: I like to help people that are not as fortunate as we are.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student.

lender.name: Mark & Linda
lender.loan_because: We want to help those who have the spirit and determination to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Mark is a children's doctor in rural West Virginia, USA. Linda is an engraver and owns a children's clothing and accessories store in Charlotte, North Carolina, USA

lender.name: Mike G.
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have the chance to do good things for their family and communities. This is a way to help those who are willing to do honest work & be proud of their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I test software for products that help veterinarians practice better medicine.

lender.name: Tina
lender.loan_because: For those of us fortunate enough to have the means to do so---why wouldn't you offer assistance?

lender.name: Karli Mason
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to make an impact for people who need it with just a small investment!
lender.occupational_info: I stay home and care for my daughter and my husband works at a bank.

lender.name: Farah
lender.loan_because: Freely you have received, freely give. - Matt. 10:8 It is better to give than to receive.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who work to improve the lives of themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I design airplanes.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I've received in the past and know that sometimes it is only monetary resources that stand in the way of a person or community bringing about change.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a public health lecturer and consultant, seeking to reduce health disparities through mobilizing and strengthening the skills of individuals and communities as well as advocating for social change.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: it starts with me. i am a female business owner and understand the challenges and rewards of starting your own business
lender.occupational_info: we manufacture items for corporates to give away.

lender.name: StJames Episcopal Church
lender.loan_because: We are committed to working towards the Millenium Development Goals

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I love the idea that small loans like this can make such a big difference in peoples' lives.

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I want to help motivated individuals and groups improve their situations.
lender.occupational_info: Our company imports and distributes stringed instruments in the US.

lender.name: Jerome Eberharter
lender.loan_because: It helps others and gives me joy.

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I received a gift certificate to loan into Kiva from my stepdaughter as a birthday present. I loved the the idea and chose to support a mother of five in Cambodia, in part because I visited the country last year and was so moved by the level of poverty there. I'm glad there's a way to make a difference, no matter how small.
lender.occupational_info: I represent commercial real estate brokers, developers, architects, and other industry-related companies, helping them to have more visibility in the media. I write press releases about their initiatives, and in general try to position them positively in newspapers, trade publications, blogs, on the Internet, TV and radio.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I realize how very hard it is to be self employed and without experience, money or assistance, most will fail. Having that extra nudge can be the difference in making it or breaking it. I want to be the part that assists in someone else "making it".
lender.occupational_info: I stage homes for a living - real estate staging / home staging.

lender.name: siti
lender.loan_because: I want to run a small bussiness to help me survive because here the salary of teacher are very low. I also want to help people arround me.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to Children in courses.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: A friend suggested it and now I see how successful small loans can be.

lender.name: JuiceTenan
lender.loan_because: I want to expand this little store,and add more fruit so that people can see the fruit.
lender.occupational_info: I started this business for three months, and rent a space in front franchise store alfamart. I'm selling a lot fruit but right now i can't afford a lot fruit,since i have on menus there are 15 different fruits, most of my customers is buyers from alfamart store.

lender.name: Rini
lender.loan_because: This is the least I can do to help others who are in need
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Supply Chain Specialist for an Oilfield Service Company. At my working place, I'm an active member of the community development projects. It's very rewarding to see others smile when we can help them :)

lender.name: salihin
lender.loan_because: we need new a camera, lights, baterai, etc.
lender.occupational_info: i have business make video for wedding, party, company profile and product. we have 5 staff as cameraman, 1 staff as editor and director, all staff is ex-addict and ex-alcoholic.

lender.name: Marcvs
lender.loan_because: it is an easy way to make a positive change in some's life.

lender.name: olson
lender.loan_because: I need for my new business here in Indonesia for selling spareparts motorcycle. Capital needed is USD 1000. Advice.. TQ
lender.occupational_info: I am working as employee.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I want to help others achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a secure juvenile detention and residential treatment facility.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I believe each of us can and should make a difference- no matter how small

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to help others provide for themselves, their families, and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Media Specialist and get to teach elementary school children how to use and enjoy libraries, books, resources, and technology.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupational_info: I am studying Animal Biology in order to hopefully help with conservation efforts in my country and province.

lender.name: DMYTRIY
lender.occupational_info: IT

lender.name: Blake & Deanne
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a change.
lender.occupational_info: Blake works for a union. Deanne teaches english as an additional language.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: helping each other makes the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a great team of people who help dentists provide better and safer services to their patients.

lender.name: Alen
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am committed to guiding Entrepreneurs and Sales Professionals to improve their sales knowledge and skills so they can achieve extraordinary sales results, close more sales effectively, and learn more to earn more.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I have traveled to 5 continents and want to lend my support
lender.occupational_info: I help people understand how to use computers in their daily lives

lender.name: Stacy
lender.loan_because: I want to share.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer; I help people use computers.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: This is a fantastic way to make an immediate difference.
lender.occupational_info: Manage IT projects and support corporate GIS.

lender.name: Rita's daughter
lender.loan_because: I think that people who are willing to take a chance should be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I'm originally from NY, am married to a wonderful man, and have 3 incredible kids. I work in a clinic serving veterans in downtown Oakland, CA. I think my mom, Rita, would've liked Kiva!

lender.name: Ignatius
lender.loan_because: I'm sure many people out there need a loan to expand their economic activities and I am sure, my loan will be very useful, although only slightly.
lender.occupational_info: I made a web hosting business. right now, so many personal or company needs these services to introduce and develop their businesses.

lender.name: Glen
lender.loan_because: My charity, ICA (International Charity for Africa) is supporting micro entrepreneurs in sub-Sahara Africa and I have seen, first hand, what a huge impact a tiny start-up loan (at low interest) can make in the lives of impoverished families and youth.
lender.occupational_info: I am the administrator of this new organization, ICA, a registered Canadian NGO delivering poverty alleviation support through working with micro-enterpreneurs to strenghten their businesses so that they can begin to generate desparately needed employment for the millions of unemployed in Africa. At ICA, we know that when parents have meaningful economic activities and or jobs, they are able to take care of their children's basic needs-food,housing, education & health. This is the approach we are taking towards fighting poverty in sub-Sahara Africa.

lender.name: Debby
lender.occupational_info: I'm concerning work in bridging & writing a project. I want to be a enterprenur self-supporting because i have a vision for that

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of all people no matter what their station in life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a business owner and investor.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to God for everything I have been given and wish to share my abundance.
lender.occupational_info: I help to manage a very large household for a very prospoerous family

lender.name: carolyn
lender.loan_because: I don't earn enough income from my work to pay tax, so I pay 'world tax' by donating to Kiva whenever I receive any lump sum from sales of my work.
lender.occupational_info: I design and make jewellery

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world, even if it is only one little bit at a time.

lender.name: Allan
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Virginia
lender.loan_because: once you know about Kiva, how could you not support it?

lender.name: Davo
lender.loan_because: Karin gave me a Valentines gift.

lender.name: catherine
lender.occupation: businesswoman and as well as child caring

lender.name: Kanya
lender.loan_because: I believe that a small thing for me can be a big thing for other people, and I also believe that giving to unfortunate people will always give me the true happiness.
lender.occupational_info: I'm an English and Japanese translator for the big Indonesia-Japan joint venture company in Indonesia. I am also a writer for a health magazine.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: DOEN Foundation supports KIVA.
lender.occupational_info: Charity Fund

lender.name: iwan
lender.loan_because: i need money for open
lender.occupational_info: i sale

lender.name: Roos
lender.loan_because: Toevallig ben ik geboren in een land waar veel welvaart is. De landen met armoede zijn ver hier vandaan. De mogelijkheid om daar naar toe te reizen en die mensen daar te helpen heb ik niet. Op deze manier hoop ik toch een bijdrage te kunnen leveren aan betere welvaart voor die mensen die het zo hard nodig hebben.

lender.name: Robi
lender.loan_because: I need to increase production of my current business.
lender.occupational_info: my business is on electronic and metal scrap trading, I buy broken electronic and unused metal ex industry or household. some of them I made repaired and resell or I sell to recycling factory or distributor.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to help contribute to another's future.

lender.name: Softace
lender.loan_because: The important thing, once you have enough to eat and a nice house, is what you can do for others, what you can contribute to the enterprise as a whole. (From DK)

lender.name: Erica
lender.loan_because: I hope people can use the money better than I do. Espero que sus sueños se hagan realidad.

lender.name: paola
lender.loan_because: kiva is the easiest the fastest the trustworthiest way of helping people in need across the world
lender.occupational_info: I used to teach literature, i.e. to build bridges across the world through words

lender.name: Phillipa
lender.loan_because: To give hope to others.
lender.occupational_info: Telecommunications Industry

lender.name: Sequeira
lender.loan_because: Because i believe that is possible to make the worl a better place to live!!!

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a lawyer for a labor union. I help people solve problems they have at their jobs, and assist them in negotiating fair wages from their employers.

lender.name: Ellie D Perfume
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to be able to pursue my own entrepreneurial dreams, and I love knowing that I am helping others do the same.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of needed funds going directly to an individual that's trying to do something proactive to improve their life, and their family's lives. It's such a simple concept and seems to really work.
lender.occupational_info: Photographer - Specializing in Real Estate Photography & Virtual Tours of Residential Homes

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: I had the opportunities most people don't

lender.name: thomas
lender.occupational_info: I work as a teacher in a museum

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I've been to these countries and I know that it is impossible for them to ever get ahead in life. They can't just go to the bank like we can, it just doesn't exist in most of these places, unless you are already rich. With Kiva, I have very little to lose, and these people have everything to gain.

lender.name: Montana Jim
lender.loan_because: I like helping other business people, and Jesus told us to help those less fortunate!

lender.name: Liliane
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel like a queen.

lender.name: Tobi
lender.loan_because: I have.
lender.occupational_info: I am on staff at Cy-Fair Christian Church which exists to connect people to God and each other and to elevate the dignity of mankind. I am currently the financial administrator. I am gifted in prayer & worship.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I can. I have been very blessed and feel a responsibility to be a good steward of what I've been blessed with to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people manage and protect their investment assets

lender.name: Katharine
lender.loan_because: God never gave up on me and he loves to give people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I help people buy and sell homes, land and businesses in Clovis, New Mexico.

lender.name: Nancy and Bob
lender.loan_because: I want to help less fortunate people in the world. My son sent me this:"I figure, worst case, you lose a few bucks, best case, these people really get on their feet and improve their way of life. Most of these countries don't have any sort of banks for poor people to draw from. Anyway, I thought it was a really neat idea and a good way to help people help themselves." I agree!

lender.name: Francis
lender.loan_because: I want to have a meaningful and direct impact in the lives of some entrepreneurs who need a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I design and help build online services.

lender.name: Paula
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the right to have a better life....

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: Being in control of one's livelihood is the best way out of poverty and an inspiration to others
lender.occupational_info: Helping architects design buildings for live performance - theatres, concert halls, school auditoria

lender.loan_because: i like helping people out

lender.occupational_info: internet cafe have high potential in here.

lender.loan_because: everyone deserves to have a successful life.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I can and I care.
lender.occupational_info: We're all in it together; those who are able should help those who need helping.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I think it is a proactive solution to a lot of world problems.

lender.name: Kenneth
lender.loan_because: Make the world a better place

lender.name: Wafa
lender.loan_because: The Prophet Muhammad (peace be upon him) said: "Blessed is the wealth of a Muslim from which he gives to the poor, to orphans and to needy travelers."
lender.occupational_info: I started my own freelance journalism company that strives to provide intelligent investigative reporting on subjects ignored by the mainstream media. If you feel like your story is something that people need to know to fight ignorance and provide a global perspective please e-mail me at newsforchange@gmail.com.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: I think this is one of the best ways to give back a bit of what I have. I think lending makes a much greater impact than charity, because it keeps going in time.
lender.occupational_info: I help big businesses to organize themselves and to make bigger profits. My company and me are hired because we are experts in how all businesses work.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: Kiva really works.

lender.name: JMP
lender.loan_because: I would want someone to loan me funds if I had a good reason.
lender.occupational_info: Finance / Strategy MBA student

lender.name: Omar
lender.loan_because: I believe giving back to those less fortunate is something we should all do.

lender.name: Xoe
lender.loan_because: Really, how many beers do I need?
lender.occupational_info: I study. A lot. And sometimes I bake, but not for a living (yet).

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: I want to be part of a positive cycle for good -- something that empowers people to create better lives for themselves.

lender.name: Mr. Lefkowitz
lender.loan_because: our 9th graders at South Medford want to help people all over the world to have a better life.
lender.occupational_info: teach our kids about their connnections to the world and how they can help make it the place of their dreams.
